RefundLinePayment.name: RefundLinePayment
RefundLinePayment.description: A refund line that has been applied to a payment.

Amount.description: The total amount applied to or unapplied from a payment by the refund line.

AppliedDate.description: The date that the refund was applied to the linked payment.

AssociatedAccountId.description: The account for the payment that received the refund.

AssociatedRefundLinePaymentId.description: The refundLine that was unapplied. Populated only when RefundLinePayment’s Type has a value of Unapplied.

Comments.description: Users can add comments to provide additional information on the refund line payment.

Date.description: By default, the day the refund line payment record was created. Users can also enter a different date.

EffectiveDate.description: Defines the date and time when the refund line application or unapplication becomes effective.

EffectiveImpactAmount.description: Shows how this payment refund line impacts a customer’s accounts receivable. This value is positive when RefundLinePayment’s Type field is Applied, and negative when RefundLinePayment’s Type is Unapplied. If there’s an unapplied line related to this record, EffectiveImpactAmount has a value of 0.

HasBeenUnapplied.description: Shows whether this refund line has been unapplied.

ImpactAmount.description: Shows how this payment refund line impacts a customer’s accounts receivable. This value is positive when RefundLinePayment’s Type field is Applied, and negative when RefundLinePayment’s Type is Unapplied.

PaymentBalance.description: The payment record’s balance following the application or unapplication of this refund line.

PaymentId.description: The payment record that this refund line targets. Refund applications and unapplications are made against this payment.

RefundBalance.description: The refund record’s balance following the application or unapplication of this payment refund line.

RefundId.description: The parent refund of this refund line.

RefundLinePaymentNumber.description: System-created unique ID for this refund line.

Type.description: Defines whether this line represents a refund that’s been applied or unapplied from a payment.

UnappliedDate.description: The date that this refund line was unapplied from a payment.
